content.query:
CREATE   VIEW vProductCategory AS

SELECT
    ProductCategoryID,
    ParentProductCategoryID,
    Name,
    rowguid,
    ModifiedDate
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://devindatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/staging/AdventureWorks/2021/11/08/ProductCategory.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
